remarks: Multiplication property of the modulo operation.  Note that the multiplier ` C ` must be an integer.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-2008.)
statement: modmul1 $p |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) /\ ( C e. ZZ /\ D e. RR+ ) /\ ( A mod D ) = ( B mod D ) ) -> ( ( A x. C ) mod D ) = ( ( B x. C ) mod D ) ) $.
